snippet: Israel on Sunday released the names of the first 477 Palestinian prisoners that it will exchange for a soldier held by the militant faction Hamas. Those being freed include the founders of Hamas’s armed wing and militants who kidnapped and killed...
lead_paragraph: Israel on Sunday released the names of the first 477 Palestinian prisoners that it will exchange for a soldier held by the militant faction Hamas. Those being freed include the founders of Hamas’s armed wing and militants who kidnapped and killed Israeli soldiers and civilians.

headline.main: Names of 477 Palestinian Prisoners Set to Be Released
